img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 44.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e6/Wukong_LowerHollow_44.jpg)
He can also perform a tricky move to counter where he jumps into the air, and pauses for a moment before slamming down with his rake. He'll immediately slide past you, pivoting to slam down again when you think you've evaded the attack.
img_below_text:
He can also steal a trick from Guangzhi and use his rake like a pogo stick, slamming down with it before hopping up and spin into another downward slash attack.
![Wukong LowerHollow 42.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8a/Wukong_LowerHollow_42.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

He can also perform a tricky move to counter where he jumps into the air, and pauses for a moment before slamming down with his rake. He'll immediately slide past you, pivoting to slam down again when you think you've evaded the attack."
            - Following Text: "He can also steal a trick from Guangzhi and use his rake like a pogo stick, slamming down with it before hopping up and spin into another downward slash attack.
![Wukong LowerHollow 42.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8a/Wukong_LowerHollow_42.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a character performing a powerful aerial attack with a rake. The preceding text describes the character's ability to counter with a jumping and slamming move, while the following text mentions another attack where the rake is used like a pogo stick. The image captures the dynamic and visually striking moment of the character executing one of these complex maneuvers, emphasizing the game's action-packed gameplay.
